text:
#BharatBiotech⁩ announces the reduced price of #COVAXIN from ₹600 to ₹400 per dose for state governments.

A much needed gesture by #MadeInIndia #Vaccine manufacturer for providing #Vaccination facility to poor and vulnerable citizens on #India.

#COVID19 #VaccinationForAll https://t.co/RuIHA6jLES
